title: Who wants to be a millionaire 2nd Edition (With Hints and cheats
description:
Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? the computer game took the World by storm. It became the biggest selling computer game of all time.
Now it&#039;s back! This time with a brand new look, a virtual audience and Chris Tarrant asking all the questions, making the whole gaming experience more realistic than ever, as you test your wits and nerves in the ultimate quiz show.

PLUS ALL THE FAMILIAR FEATURES OF THE SHOW AND THE ORIGINAL GAME
Phone-A-Friend, Ask The Audience, 50:50, Fastest Finger and not forgetting the entire music score recreating the atmosphere of the TV show.

FEATURES A BRAND NEW LOOK
Including improved video sequences and a new virtual set with audience OVER 1,000 EXCLUSIVE QUESTIONS.
Written by the Question Masters, asked by Chris Tarrant.

FASTER LOADING TIMES
Plus sequence skip and save game option.

COMPETE AGAINST FRIENDS AND FAMILY
Either Head to Head or in teams.


Installation:

Full retail version no key or crack needed.

First hit "Autorun.exe"

Please help sharing by seeding as long as you can, thank you!


CPU: Pentium 166MHz (minimum); Pentium II 266MHz recommended
RAM: 16Mb (minimum); 32Mb recommended
Windows: 95/98/Me/XP
Graphics card: 2Mb DirectX 7 compatible (minimum); 4Mb recommended
Sound card: DirectX 7 compatible  
Disc drive: 4 x CD-ROM
